question: What new designation did Bath receive in 2021 related to UNESCO?
true_answer: Included in the "Great Spa Towns of Europe"
asked_question_translated: Quelle nouvelle désignation Bath a-t-elle reçue en 2021 dans le cadre de l'UNESCO ?
answer: En 2021, Bath a été désignée comme faisant partie des "Great Spa Towns of Europe" par l'UNESCO.
answer_translated_eng: In 2021, Bath was designated one of the "Great Spa Towns of Europe" by UNESCO.
